text: Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:1950 establishments in the United States Ross Stores is an American chain of discount department stores. It is headquartered in Dublin, California. It has 1,483 stores in 37 U.S. states, the District of Columbia and Guam. It is the largest off-price retailer in the U.S. It was founded in 1950.
title: Ross Stores
